UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Synthetic peptides bioinspired in temporin-PTa with antibacterial and antibiofilm activity.
Literature.Author: Souza E Silva P, Ferreira MA, de Moraes LFR, de Barros E, Preza SLE, Cardoso MH, Franco OL, Migliolo L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 19433(MBC=23µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=23µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=23µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=2.8µM),Escherichia coli KPC 001812446(MBC=2.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=11.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 002210477(MIC=46µM)
